Sentencas: A novel method to produce dense bodies of SrO- and MgO-doped LaGaO3 (LSGM) ceramics by microwave assisted processing in a very short time of 10 min is reported here.
Titulo: Microwave assisted synthesis and sintering of La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O2.815

Sentencas: The heating was carried out using Na-beta-alumina as the microwave susceptor.
Titulo: Microwave assisted synthesis and sintering of La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O2.815

Sentencas: The phase purity and electrical properties of the microwave processed samples were determined and compared with a conventionally processed material.
Titulo: Microwave assisted synthesis and sintering of La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O2.815

Sentencas: It was found that LSGM with a composition La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O2.815 always yielded a two-phase mixture though the presence of second phase did not affect the conductivity significantly at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Microwave assisted synthesis and sintering of La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O2.815

Sentencas: The microstructure was found to be more uniform in case of the microwave sintered material.
Titulo: Microwave assisted synthesis and sintering of La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O2.815
